All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationInterface, CommListener
public class LocalSubscriberPort
extends SubscriberPort
implements CommListener

The Subscriber Port class provides objects with a mechanism for subscribing to publications.

addSubscriber

public void addSubscriber(SubscriberCallback callback,
                          short subscription_id)
Description copied from class: SubscriberPort
Registers a subscriber with this SubscriberPort. The subscriber should be a class which implements the SubscriberCallback interface. It should also supply an id. When a publication comes in, the SubscriberCallback's notify() method will be called with the given id. This allows the Subscriber to register the same callback with several port instances and identify which port an incoming publication is from.

Specified by:
addSubscriber in class SubscriberPort
See Also:
SubscriberPort.addSubscriber(SubscriberCallback, short)

Description copied from class: SubscriberPort
